ModMetaData.name: Vehicles
ModMetaData.author: Smash Phil
ModMetaData.description:
Welcome to the official <color=cyan>Closed Beta</color> for Vehicles.
This marks an official turning point for Vehicles as this mod will remain on the workshop until a full-release is in order. I will use this mod for testing purposes in order to iron out the bugs before I create a full release.
This is a limited access beta with certain features disabled until they receive further work such as incidents, raiders, trader caravans, air defenses, and fishing compatibility.
If you have ideas, feedback, or a bug to report, please head on over to the GitHub Issues page (link is provided in the steam workshop description) and make an appropriate ticket there.
